summary: The diff largely implements a static South Essentials storefront (hero + categories + products + client-side cart) and updates SEO metadata, but the tagline is not used exactly as specified in prominent UI text, and there is no evidence that the required generated image files were added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use the tagline exactly: "your one stop shop for south indian products" in prominent branding (hero/tagline text).
missing_requirements.reason: The hero tagline text is capitalized as "Your one stop shop for south indian products", which does not match the required tagline string exactly.

missing_requirements.requirement: All required new images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated (south-temple-hero.dim_1920x1080.png, silk-sarees-category.dim_1200x800.png, south-snacks-category.dim_1200x800.png, south-dance-category.dim_1200x800.png).
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references the /assets/generated/... paths in multiple places, but the diff summary does not show any added files under frontend/public/assets/generated, so existence cannot be verified from the provided changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an empty placeholder React Query hooks file (useQueries.ts) for future backend operations.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; backend/data fetching was not required for static catalog/cart behavior.
